pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python Tedee Client PackageThis is a Tedee Lock Client package.Download:git clone https://github.com/joerg65/pytedee.gitInstall:pipenv install -e .orpython3 setup.py installTry it with the example.py:- Generate personal key. Instructions: https://tedee-tedee-api-doc.readthedocs-hosted.com/en/latest/howtos/authenticate.html#personal-access-key Minimal scopes required for enable integration are: - Devices.Read - Lock.Operate- Edit personalKey with generated value.
